text: NextGen AI is a voice assistant orchestration platform using lane-based architecture.
The system uses three lanes: Reflex for acknowledgements, Reasoned for substantive responses, and Control for policy enforcement.
Voice Jib-Jab is browser-first and requires no mobile app installation.
The platform targets sub-400ms time-to-first-byte for responsive voice interactions.
All responses are grounded in retrieved facts using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
